level.heading: RESIDENCY IN DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA (ยง 19-202)

level.text: 202.1 At least fifty-one percent (51%) of the employees of the Authority shalle residents of the District of Columbia.
202.2 In order to encourage the hiring of District residents, the President andhief Executive Officer shall administer recruitment strategies and programsargeted to District residents.

202.3 All qualified candidates for vacant positions who live in the Districtnd who apply for a District residency preference shall have five (5) additionaloints added to the points they receive during their application process.

202.4 Anyone who successfully applies for a position and receives preferenceoints for District residency during the application process shall maintainistrict residency for sixty (60) months after appointment to that position.
